textBox.richText: We just uploaded a new beta for everyone to review. While the changes in this beta are not nearly as sweeping as the first beta they nevertheless do require a data file update. Same warning as before applies (back up your data, not responsible for lost puppies, etc.). If you run into any issues with this beta please let us know right away so that we can get the issue corrected for the next beta. If you find a way to crash this beta, please send us the crash report so that we can get the issue corrected right away. If you have any questions feel free to write us at support@zarrastudios.com. The following items were changed or updated in this beta: • A correction was made to the rental serial number code. A default serial number will now be generated when you select Product -> Rental -> Add Serial Number. • The rental menu items have been updated slightly to be disabled when an item is not flagged as “rentable.” • The ability to add an invoice item during the return process has been added. In addition, it is possible to remove items from the invoice during the return process -- but only the items added during the return. • Instant Discounts! You can now add an instant discount to an invoice as either a flat discount or a percentage off. These discounts are trackable and a report for them will be available soon. • A few corrections to the printing of invoices which correct a bug when there is no employee active. • Item Management window should now remember the column sizes, order and window positions. MSZ
